hero.paragraph: I am a full stack developer, with experience in frontend, backend & cloud technologies.

content.about: My name is Albin Kärvling. I have been coding since I was 12, and am currently {age} years old. I am a full stack developer specializing in frontend development, but have knowledge of both backend and cloud solutions. In 2023, I graduated high school specializing in natural sciences, though programming has always been my true calling.

statify.title: Statify
statify.description: An application to expand and view your listening habits. Made using Next.js and Spotify’s API.
statify.longDescription: Statify was created to easily expand your own music taste based on similar artists and songs you like. If you want to, explore entirely new genres & artists.

medito.title: Medito
medito.description: A fundraiser website created for a well-established meditation organization.
medito.longDescription: Medito was a fundraising project I was assigned by a well-established meditation organization. The deadline for this project was a little under a week, but I finished within the timeframe and this solution was accepted.

onixo.title: Onixo
onixo.description: A website for a multi-purpose discord bot. Information and an interactive dashboard.
onixo.longDescription: This website displays information and use cases of the discord bot Onixo. It also allows users to interact with the bot’s settings in the dashboard. It uses Python for the backend, and websockets to talk with the bot.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: My website displaying my knowledge, experiences, tech-stack and a little about me.
portfolio.longDescription: I have made a lot of portfolio websites during my journey getting here. This is the latest one, made using Next.js, Tailwind and i18n for translations.
